Token.Abstract: Called when the resource was succeffully fetched and encoded

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object for the current request

Parameter.Name: resource
Parameter.Abstract: The converted objc representation of the response data returned by the server.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Any custom object you passed in while making the request.

Token.Abstract: Called when the connection fails in situations where the server is not available, etc.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object for the current request

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error returned by the connection.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Any custom object you passed in while making the request.

Token.Abstract: Called when the connection receieves any type of response

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object for the current request

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The response object returned by the server.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Any custom object you passed in while making the request.

Token.Abstract: Called when the connection receieves a statusCode that isn't a success code.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object for the current request

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error returned by the connection.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The response object returned by the server.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Any custom object you passed in while making the request.

Token.Abstract: Called when the HRFormatter recieved an error parsing the response data.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object for the current request

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The parser error returned by the formatter.

Parameter.Name: body
Parameter.Abstract: A string representation of the response body returned by the server.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: Any custom object you passed in while making the request.
